texto: interest Enabling system Y Interaction Enabling with enabling software systems system Z Figure 3 —Software system-of-interest, its operational environment and enabling systems During a stage in the software life cycle, the relevant enabling systems and the system‐of‐interest are considered together. Since they are interdependent, they can also be viewed as a system.
